about.title: About JamContest
about.subtitle: A Fair Playing Field for Creators
intro: JamContest is an independent, non-profit global contest platform designed to create a truly fair and transparent environment for creators.
It exists to support real production, structured evaluation, and meaningful opportunity — not hype, not exploitation, and not hidden monetization.
mission_points: Support creators beyond the competition itself
no_charges: We do not charge participation fees.
We do not sell user data.
funding_paragraphs: JamContest may accept donations or sponsorships.
All funds are used exclusively for:
funding_list: Scholarships or grants for outstanding participants

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.sec1_subm_item_1: Files you upload (images, videos, code, documents)
privacy.sec2_item_1: Account Management: To authenticate you and manage your profile
privacy.sec2_item_2: Contest Operations: To process submissions and display them to jury members
privacy.sec2_item_3: Communication: To notify you about contest updates and results
privacy.sec2_item_4: Platform Improvement: To analyze usage patterns and fix bugs
privacy.sec3_para1: We do NOT sell, rent, or trade your personal information.
privacy.sec3_para2: We only share data in these limited cases:
privacy.sec3_item_1: Public Display: Your username, submissions, and contest rankings are visible to other users
privacy.sec3_item_2: Jury Members: Assigned juries can view submissions for contests they're evaluating
privacy.sec3_item_3: Legal Requirements: If required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.sec4_para1: Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption. We implement industry-standard security measures, but no system is 100% secure. Use strong passwords and don't share your account.
privacy.sec4_para2: File Uploads: All uploaded files are stored locally on our servers (not on third-party cloud services). Access is restricted to authorized users only.
privacy.sec5_para1: We use essential cookies to keep you logged in and remember your preferences. We do NOT use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacy.sec6_item_3: Request deletion of your account (with some exceptions for contest history)
privacy.sec6_item_4: Withdraw from contests before submission deadlines
privacy.sec7_item_1: Active Accounts: Data retained as long as your account is active
privacy.sec7_item_2: Contest Submissions: Kept indefinitely for historical records and portfolio purposes
privacy.sec7_item_3: Deleted Accounts: Personal data removed within 30 days (submissions may remain anonymized)
privacy.sec8_para1: We do not integrate with third-party analytics, advertising, or tracking services. This is a self-contained platform with no external data sharing.
privacy.sec9_para1: Users must be 13 years or older. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.
privacy.sec10_para1: We may update this policy occasionally. Significant changes will be announced on the platform.
privacy.sec11_para1: Questions about privacy? Contact us at our contact page.

transparency_list: Contest rules are published before launch
Results follow the announced scoring framework
governance_paragraphs: JamContest was initiated by its founder as a structured and accountable initiative.
The founder ensures platform integrity and adherence to its principles.
All contests operate under predefined rules; volunteer roles are responsibility-based; structural decisions are recorded; the system stands above individuals.
closing: JamContest is not built to create power. It is built to create trust. Independence: No venture capital. No corporate ownership. No external control.

about_extra.independent_line: JamContest operates as an independent, non-profit initiative.

coc.title: Code of Conduct
coc.intro: JamContest is committed to maintaining a fair, respectful, and safe environment for all participants.

sections.heading: 1. Respect
sections.body: All users must treat others with respect. Harassment, discrimination, hate speech, or personal attacks based on race, gender, nationality, religion, disability, or background will not be tolerated.

sections.heading: 2. Fair Competition
sections.body: All submissions must be original work. Plagiarism, unauthorized use of third-party content, or intellectual property theft will result in immediate disqualification. Attempting to manipulate voting or jury outcomes is strictly prohibited.

sections.heading: 3. Professional Conduct
sections.body: Participants and organizers must communicate respectfully, avoid disruptive or hostile behavior, and act in good faith during disputes.

sections.heading: 4. Transparency & Integrity
sections.body: Jury members must evaluate submissions according to published criteria. Conflicts of interest must be disclosed. Organizers must document structural decisions when applicable.

sections.heading: 5. Enforcement
sections.body: Violations may result in warning, disqualification, temporary suspension, or permanent ban. Enforcement decisions are made within the defined governance framework.

sections.heading: 6. Reporting
sections.body: If you experience or witness misconduct, please report it through the contact page. JamContest will review reports confidentially and fairly.

governance.title: Governance Model
governance.intro: JamContest was initiated by its founder as an independent, structured initiative. The governance model is designed to ensure fairness, accountability, and long-term sustainability.

sections.heading: 1. Founder Responsibility
points: The founder does not override published contest rules.

sections.heading: 2. Organizers
sections.body: Organizers are volunteers selected based on experience, alignment with platform principles, and demonstrated responsibility. Organizer roles are responsibility-based and may be time-limited.

sections.heading: 3. Jury
sections.body: Jury members are publicly listed. Evaluation criteria are announced before contest launch. Jury decisions operate strictly within the defined framework.

sections.heading: 4. System Over Individuals
sections.body: JamContest operates under predefined rules. No individual, including the founder, stands above the announced framework.

sections.heading: 5. Amendments
sections.body: Governance structure may evolve as the platform grows. Significant structural changes may be documented in the Transparency Report.

governance.note: Governance structures may evolve as the platform grows.
